channel.title: Help needed!
channel.description:
Can someone give me the code for making admins immune for getting banned i only want playerrights 3 to be able to ban admins, but i dont know how to code this ;) please help me!!
REP++ To all who help me..

item.title: Help needed!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

 if(command.startsWith("banuser")) {

change that to

if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerrights == 2) {

if(command.startsWith("banuser") && playerrights == 2) if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(NAMEHERE)) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

Btw you cant ++ and shut about it

Read full topic
